argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_modcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod M ) e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_jca | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod M ) e. RR /\ A e. RR ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. ZZ /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod M ) e. RR /\ A e. RR ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_3simpc | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. ZZ /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( B e. ZZ /\ M e. RR+ ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_modabs2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod M ) mod M ) = ( A mod M ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. ZZ /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod M ) mod M ) = ( A mod M ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_modmul1 | |- ( ( ( ( A mod M ) e. RR /\ A e. RR ) /\ ( B e. ZZ /\ M e. RR+ ) /\ ( ( A mod M ) mod M ) = ( A mod M ) ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) x. B ) mod M ) = ( ( A x. B ) mod M ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 5, 7, 8 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. ZZ /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) x. B ) mod M ) = ( ( A x. B ) mod M ) ) |
